\begin{document}
\centering
\begin{minipage}{5cm}
	\[
		P^N_T(i, n)
		=
		\frac{1}{T^n}
		\cdot
		\prod_{j=0}^{i - n - 1}
		\left(1 - \frac{j}{T}\right)
	\]
\end{minipage}
\end{document}
